current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the FLAME Act of 2009 to provide for additional wildfire suppression activities, to
			 provide for the conduct of certain forest treatment projects, and for
			 other purposes.
